scripts.rts: npx cypress run && npm run genrpt
scripts.udqtest: npm run cleanrpt && npm run rts -- --spec cypress\tests\Reports\* && npm run genrpt
scripts.configtest: npm run cleanrpt && npm run rts -- --spec cypress\tests\ConfigurationAndTaxes\* && npm run genrpt
scripts.setuptest: npm install && npm run cleanrpt && npm run rts -- --spec cypress\tests\SetupAndMaintenance\* && npm run genrpt
scripts.cleanrpt: npm run cleanhrpt && npm run cleanmrpt && npm run cleanfile
scripts.genrpt: npm run mergerpt && npm run createrpt
